item.title: #en @ 1489409562620792833
item.description:
Isko Moreno wants open data policy and use of digital platforms and technology to lessen chances of corruption.
In Manila, his administration set up the Go Manila app so citizens pay for transactions online. Moreno wants national implementation of such a program.

item.title: #en @ 1488900089972023298
item.description: Some good insights from #PollutionIsColonialism so far. Colonialism should not be conflated with racism, sexism, or other isms, it is its own thing with its own ways of dismantling. Anticolonial science centers the place(s) where science happens, it's people(s), and history(s).
